name: Deep Horrors "Text Adventure"
description:
Deep Horrors is a classic style text adventure in the Survival Horror genre. This is an old project from a few years ago that did not see much time after completion.

You play as a musician named Tom, he arrives at a house and must find a way out. The gameplay consists of having to find items inside and outside the house all whilst there are only ever 4 directions to go. North, East, South and West. The game does have some bugs but is fully playable.

The entire project is available and is fully Open-Source. Feel free to edit it, change it up, even use it to help you learn some of the basics of C++.

The download comes with the C++ project along with a full exe build. There is a joke when the user presses 4 on the menu.
